long_description: A tough, steel-framed bike for BMX freestylers, the Diamondback Grind 20 in. Bike offers everything you need to get out there. Beefy steel frame and fork withstand the force of freestyle antics. 42-tooth steel cranks and 16-tooth freewheel make up the rugged single-speed drivetrain. Leechi U rear brake provides stopping power. Sturdy 20 in. BMX wheels are outfitted with DB Cellblock tires for reliable performance. Specs on the Diamondback Grind 20 in. BMX boys' bike are subject to change.
short_description: A tough, steel-framed bike for BMX freestylers, the Diamondback Grind 20 in. Bike offers everything you need to get out there.
